description: This function allows retrieval of a DGS element's current position, relative to its parent.
This function sets the position of a DGS element.
dgsSetPosition.body: dgsSetPosition(${1:element theElement}, ${2:float x}, ${3:float y}, ${4:bool relative [}, ${5:bool isCenterPosition = false ]})

description: This function is used for setting a DGS element as the parent of another DGS element.
This function is used to determine the parent of a DGS element.
This function returns one of the child dgs elements of a given parent dgs element. The child dgs element is selected by its index (0 for the first child, 1 for the second and so on).
